overview: Steve Hoffman provides overall leadership to iJET, including strategic direction, planning and execution of the company’s growth and development initiatives. He brings more than 28 years of senior leadership experience to the management team. Prior to joining iJET, he served as the CEO of Element K, a business-to-business learning business process outsourcing company, where he repositioned the company for consistent and sustainable market leadership. Element K was acquired by NIIT in 2006 and Steve subsequently oversaw the successful integration of the two companies. Prior to Element K, Steve served as the President and COO of Blackboard Inc., a leader in enterprise learning software, where he was instrumental in rapidly growing revenues and profits. Previously, Steve served as President and CEO of Sylvan Prometric (later, Prometric Thomson Learning), where he established the company as an industry leader as well as dramatically expanded the company’s presence globally. Before joining Prometric, Steve served in senior management positions at Computer Task Group, an international provider of IT outsourcing and system integration services. Steve began his career with IBM. He holds a BA and MBA from the University of Rochester.
